name: LatLongExampleTest
description: Tests for demonstrating the usage of RTree for distance searches with Lat Long points and GeoCircleValue objects.

methods.name: search
methods.signature: public static <T> Observable<Entry<T, Point>> search(RTree<T, Point> tree, Point lonLat, final double distanceKm)

methods.name: createBounds
methods.signature: private static Rectangle createBounds(final Position from, final double distanceKm)

methods.name: createGeoCircleValue
methods.signature: private static <T> GeoCircleValue<T> createGeoCircleValue(Point point, double radiusKm, T value)

methods.name: add
methods.signature: private static <T> RTree<GeoCircleValue<T>, Rectangle> add(RTree<GeoCircleValue<T>, Rectangle> tree, GeoCircleValue<T> c)

nested_classes.name: GeoCircleValue
nested_classes.description: Internal class representing a geographic circle with a value.

test_cases.name: testLatLongExample
test_cases.description: Demonstrates how to use RTree to find cities within a specified distance from Canberra.

test_cases.name: testSearchLatLongCircles
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality to find GeoCircleValues that contain a specific point (Bungendore).
